stages.logText: On the road to Feygard, near the Feygard bridge, I met a shepherd named Tinlyn. Tinlyn told me that four of his sheep have wandered away and that he won't dare leave the remaining sheep to go look for them.
I have agreed to help Tinlyn find his four lost sheep.
I have found one of Tinlyn's lost sheep.
I have found one of Tinlyn's lost sheep.
I have found one of Tinlyn's lost sheep.
I have found one of Tinlyn's lost sheep.
I have found all four of Tinlyn's lost sheep.
Tinlyn thanked me for finding his lost sheep.
Tinlyn thanked me for finding his lost sheep, but he had no reward to give me.
I have attacked at least one of Tinlyn's lost sheep and I am therefore unable to return them all to Tinlyn.
